abstract: Carl C. Icahn, the billionaire activist investor, appears to have won at least one seat on the board of Biogen Idec in his second attempt to elect his own directors of the drug company.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn, the billionaire activist investor, appears to have won at least one seat on the board of Biogen Idec in his second attempt to elect his own directors of the drug company.
lead_paragraph: Update | 3:55 p.m. Carl C. Icahn, the billionaire activist investor, appears to have won at least one seat on the board of Biogen Idec in his second attempt to elect his own directors of the drug company.

headline.main: Icahn Wins at Least One Board Seat at Biogen Idec
